title: Stacey Solomon says she might never marry Joe Swash
text:

Stacey Solomon has admitted she'll probably never get married to Joe Swash - but she still wants him to propose.

The Loose Women says just because they'll never walk down the aisle doesn't mean he shouldn't put a ring on it.

The former X Factor star opened up about the future of her relationship, four months after they welcomed their adorable son Rex together.

Stacey, who was already mum to Zachary, 11, and Leighton, eight, told new magazine: "I want an engagement ring, but I'm not bothered about getting married.

"Neither of us are! I have those weird preset ideas that I should get married and have a big white dress but it's not the be all and end all. We have our family, we're together, we're practically married in our opinion.

(Image: Instagram)

"That piece of paper for us isn't something we feel we need right now."

Stacey, 30, had raised her boys as a single parent before meeting Joe, who is also dad to Harry, 11, and previously said it's no better or worse without the father there.

She said: "Neither have been better, or worse, or easier, or harder than another.

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

"With Zachary, my circumstances were completely different. I was in college, I wasn't with his dad and things were really tough, but also really brilliant."

Stacey said her circumstances were different again when she has Leighton, and that it's never been the same with any of her children.

Throughout her pregnancy with baby Rex and since welcoming him, Stacey has been praised by fans for her honest posts about pregnancy and motherhood.

(Image: Instagram)

Stacey even took Rex on Loose Women for his TV debut, and he left viewers distracted with his cuteness.
